Mitigation.Apache:
-Easy solution: Replace the instruction of the directive SSLCipherSuite with the following string:
{total_string}
-Expert solution: Check the directive SSLCipherSuite and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element you can add either - (remove once) or ! (kill) in front of it.

{total_string}
-Expert solution: Check the directive ssl_ciphers and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element you can add either - (remove once) or ! (kill) in front of it.
